name: Spredfast Zendesk Integration
description: Example of Spredfast Notifications service integration

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku app name. Copy verbatim from App Name (optional) above

SPREDFAST_API_TOKEN.description: Spredfast API Access Token obtained from https://apiexplorer.spredfast.com

SPREDFAST_COMPANY_ID.description: Spredfast directory company id obtained from https://apiexplorer.spredfast.com

SPREDFAST_LABEL_NAME.description: Label name that will create a case when applied to a stream item

ZENDESK_APP_URL.description: URL of your ZenDesk Instance. Example: https://mycompany.zendesk.com

NOTIFIER_BEARER_TOKEN.description: Random bearer token for Spredfast subscription, do not modify
